comments.author: boomman37@gmail.com
comments.creator: boomman37@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
When I try to set image as wallpaper using Firefox, it does get smoothed out.
See attached image for example.
I have to save image and set it as wallpaper myself if don't want sandpaper on my desktop.
This happens when wallpaper is larger than your monitor but has same aspect ratio.
I used Set As Desktop Wallpaper, Stretch to get this result.
comments.text:
Created attachment 575746
On the left is wallpaper snippet set by FF, on the right by XnView

When I try to set image as wallpaper using Firefox, it does get smoothed out.
See attached image for example.
I have to save image and set it as wallpaper myself if don't want sandpaper on my desktop.
This happens when wallpaper is larger than your monitor but has same aspect ratio.
I used Set As Desktop Wallpaper, Stretch to get this result.
